other.title: Looker Studio Enterprise Dashboards
other.description: Comprehensive business intelligence dashboards built with Looker Studio, featuring advanced SQL queries, ETL pipelines, and real-time data visualization for executive reporting and operational insights.
highlights: Complex SQL queries with window functions and CTEs for data transformation
Automated ETL pipelines connecting multiple data sources
Real-time KPI monitoring for executive stakeholders
Custom calculated fields and advanced aggregations

other.title: Texas Hold'em Hand Analyzer
other.description: Interactive poker hand analyzer that calculates winning probabilities for Texas Hold'em showdowns. Features random card dealing, hand strength evaluation, and real-time odds calculation using Monte Carlo simulation.
highlights: Random card dealing algorithm for realistic gameplay
Monte Carlo simulation for accurate win probability calculation
Real-time hand strength evaluation and ranking
Interactive UI for card selection and scenario testing
Statistical analysis of different starting hands
